channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Starbucks’ new CEO Brian Niccol went from fast-food Frankenstein to Chipotle’s redeemer
item.description: Niccol helped create Taco Bell’s mega-viral Doritos Locos Taco before leading Chipotle’s food safety crisis turnaround.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Starbucks, Chipotle, Home Depot, Tencent and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Dow and Nasdaq carrying 330-plus-point gains into afternoon trading
I’m a Gen Zer starting a career in homebuilding. Skipping college was the best decision I ever made
item.description: College can bring success. It can also bring student debt and regret.

item.title: Investors are banking on the Fed to save stocks and the economy, according to Wall Street survey
item.description: More than 90% of fund managers are expecting lower short-term rates in the next 12 months, marking the highest percentage in the past 24 years, BofA said.

item.title: Wall Street ‘fear gauge’ — the VIX — continues to normalize after recent spike
Ford and Mazda beg nearly 500,000 owners to stop driving older cars with deadly air bags
item.description: The warning covers more than 374,000 Ford, Lincoln and Mercury vehicles, as well as nearly 83,000 Mazdas.

item.title: UAW hits Musk, Trump with federal labor charges over union-busting comments
item.description: During Donald Trump and Elon Musk's two-hour conversation on X, the former president complimented the Tesla CEO on firing workers who wanted to strike.

item.title: Nasdaq and S&P on track for best four-session spans since November
EU warns Elon Musk over X compliance—he fires back with vulgar ‘Tropic Thunder’ meme
item.description: The EU Commission forced to defend claims a strongly worded letter to Elon Musk was proof Brussels is interfering in U.S. elections.

item.title: Crypto magnate buys SpaceX mission for private polar spaceflight expedition
item.description: Cryptocurrency speculator Chun Wang bought a SpaceX multi-day flight for an undisclosed amount, the company announced on Monday.

item.title: Bond-market investors are snapping up Starbucks debt
Starbucks poaches Chipotle CEO Brian Niccol in surprise leadership shake-up
item.description: Laxman Narasimhan was ousted after just over a year in the CEO role.

item.title: Digital health company Ro launches GLP-1 insurance-coverage checker to help patients navigate costs
item.description: Ro said it hopes its new tool will be able to help patients understand their GLP-1 coverage options so they can decide how to pursue weight loss.

item.title: Chipotle shares enduring worst day in seven years as CEO exits for Starbucks
